targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "io_reads" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "tag", "tag"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "io_reads" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "tag", "tag"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "io_reads" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "tag", "tag"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "io_reads" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "tag", "tag"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("usage_iowait"), 1s) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) *8 FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$netif$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$host/
list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$host/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$host/
list.label: Interface
list.name: netif
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$host/
